CloudUnit – the Java PaaS

 

Deploy your Java / JEE applications to the cloud

Treeptik, the specialist of Java / JEE applications and Cloud-computing, is building an innovative Plateform as a Service: CloudUnit


 


C

loudUnit is a project developed in our R&D department. It's a Plateform as a Service (PaaS) to the cloud for Java developers. It reduces substantially development and delivery time of web applications

CloudUnit brings to developers an application environment with servers, databases and all the tools necessary to the application. It takes care of the creation, configuration and monitoring of theses services whether there are deployed on a public or a private cloud. Developers push their application code, CloudUnit do the rest.

CloudUnit is a great step forward in the industrialization of software development. It allows teams to focus on their core business. Developers can get down on development of new features and infrastructures teams can devote the entirety of their resources to the system administration . It is a real asset for competitiveness.

Features


  • No modifications in application code
  • Deployment with Git
  • Deployment with a Web Interface or command-line
  • Automatic Release
  • Simplified Rollback
  • Pay-as-you-go

Added value


  • Better cost efficiency
  • Security
  • More agile IS
  • Better productivity
  • Lower innovation cost
